properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 10:37AM EST until February 15 at 3:24AM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg SC
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg
has issued a Flood Warning for the French Broad River At Blantyre
affecting Henderson and Transylvania Counties...

.Runoff from heavy rain will cause the river to rise above flood
stage.

The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a

* Flood Warning for the French Broad River At Blantyre.
* until late Friday night...or until the warning is cancelled.
* At 10:16 AM Thursday the stage was 15.4 feet
* Minor Flood Stage is 16.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* FORECAST: The river will rise above Minor Flood Stage by late this
afternoon and continue to rise to near 16.5 feet by early Friday
morning.the river will fall below Minor Flood Stage by Friday
afternoon.
* Impact...At 16.0 feet...Farmland flooding continues on both side of
the river. Floodwaters begin to impact boat access areas at Grove
Bridge Rd. and Crab Creek Rd.
* Impact...At 15.0 feet...Most farm fields are flooding between the
River and Brevard Rd. and between the river and Pleasant Grove Rd.
properties.instruction:
The latest stages and forecasts for rivers can be found on our web
page at http://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=gsp
